name: Hollow Woods
description:
A challenging first person RPG created for #hps1jam

Inspired by games like King's Field and Morrowind

WADS to move, click to attack, shift to run, e to interact

Music by Nathan Hanover! Listen to more of their awesome music here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-8L7n7l11PJM6FFcI6Ju8A
